title: Schema Markup for SEO | Improve Search Visibility with Structured Data
description: Boost your website’s search visibility with schema markup. Westtown Websites helps you implement structured data to improve rankings, increase click-through rates, and achieve rich snippets on Google.

aboutSection.heading: Ongoing Website Care Tailored for Growth and Peak Performance.
aboutSection.content:
Your website is a vital tool for your business, but keeping it running smoothly requires continuous attention. Westtown Websites provides comprehensive website management and maintenance services to ensure your site stays current, secure, and optimized for success.

From improving SEO and Core Web Vitals to publishing blog content, performing accessibility audits, and providing reliable hosting, we manage all aspects of your website so it performs at its best—giving you peace of mind and allowing you to focus on what matters most: growing your business.

masonryLayout.title: SEO Optimization & Indexing Fixes
masonryLayout.description: Ensuring your site is properly indexed is key to ranking on Google. We address indexing issues and optimize content using structured data, like schema markup, to improve search visibility. Businesses that invest in SEO are 13 times more likely to see a positive ROI, and schema markup can increase click-through rates by 30%. Learn more.

masonryLayout.title: Core Web Vitals Audits
masonryLayout.description: A smooth user experience leads to better rankings and conversions. Websites optimized for Core Web Vitals are more likely to rank higher on Google, and a 1-second improvement in load time can boost conversion rates by 20%. Learn more.

masonryLayout.title: Performance Improvements
masonryLayout.description: Performance is crucial. A 2-second delay can result in abandonment rates as high as 87%. We optimize images, code, and hosting solutions to ensure your site loads quickly, improving user retention.

masonryLayout.title: Accessibility & Legal Compliance
masonryLayout.description: Ensuring your website meets WCAG standards isn't just about inclusivity—it's a legal necessity. According to a report by UsableNet, web accessibility lawsuits increased by 14% in 2022 compared to the previous year. Regular accessibility audits ensure your site adheres to ADA guidelines, protecting your business from potential legal risks.

masonryLayout.title: Hosting & Security Management
masonryLayout.description: We partner with trusted hosting providers to ensure your website stays online with minimal downtime. Our hosting and security management services provide peace of mind, with regular monitoring and updates to protect your site from vulnerabilities.

masonryLayout.title: Content & Blog Management
masonryLayout.description: Keeping your site’s content fresh and engaging is key to staying relevant. We handle everything from regular blog updates to content optimization, ensuring your site remains SEO-friendly and informative for your audience.

faqItems.question: How often should my website be updated?
faqItems.answer: Regular updates are crucial for security, performance, and SEO. We recommend updating your website at least once a month for content and every 6 months for performance, SEO, and security audits.

faqItems.question: Can you fix indexing issues on my website?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we address indexing issues by reviewing your site's structure, optimizing the sitemap, and ensuring that all relevant pages are properly indexed by search engines. This helps improve your search visibility.

faqItems.question: How does schema markup improve my website’s SEO?
faqItems.answer: Schema markup helps search engines understand the content on your website better, which can enhance your appearance in search results, including rich snippets. Implementing schema improves visibility and can lead to higher click-through rates.

faqItems.question: How do you monitor website performance?
faqItems.answer: We use tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and PageSpeed Insights to track performance. We monitor key metrics such as page load times, bounce rates, and Core Web Vitals to ensure your site is running optimally.

faqItems.question: What are Core Web Vitals, and why are they important?
faqItems.answer: Core Web Vitals are a set of performance metrics that measure user experience on your website, including load speed, interactivity, and visual stability. These factors affect your search rankings and user engagement, making them crucial for SEO.

faqItems.question: How do you ensure my website stays secure?
faqItems.answer: We partner with trusted hosting providers and use regular security updates, backups, and monitoring tools to ensure your website stays safe from vulnerabilities. We also monitor uptime and perform regular security audits.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Online Presence?
cta.description: Contact us today to schedule a consultation and start building a custom website that sets your business apart.
